casepack.title: Nuclear Chain Dynamics — Binding, Decay, Fissility, Shell Structure & Double-Sided Collapse
casepack.description: Nuclear physics casepack covering 6 subdomains: nuclide binding (SEMF), alpha decay (Geiger-Nuttall), decay chains (U-238 series), fissility (Bohr-Wheeler), shell structure (magic numbers), and double-sided collapse (iron peak convergence). Contains 30 experiments spanning the periodic table from H-1 to Og-294, with the U-238 decay chain as paradigm case. All frozen choices per expert review: mean lifetime τ=T½/ln(2), Ni-62 peak at 8.7945 MeV/nucleon, Geiger-Nuttall scaling.

run_intent.notes: Validate 30 nuclear experiments across 6 closures against NUC.INTSTACK.v1 contract
